definition: pleasantly, even unrealistically, optimistic, an unaccented beat (especially the last beat of a measure)
details:
adjective
- pleasantly, even unrealistically, optimistic
= example: pleasantly, even unrealistically, optimistic
= synonyms: cheerful
noun
- an unaccented beat (especially the last beat of a measure)
= synonyms: offbeat
- a contented state of being happy and healthy and prosperous
= example: a contented state of being happy and healthy and prosperous
= synonyms: welfare
